title: Hispanic population of the U.S. 2000 to 2018
summary: Overall Population in millions has increased over the Year.
Population in millions is slightly increasing from 2004 to 2008.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2006 and 2007.
The highest Population in millions, of value 47.79 was reached at Year 2008
Minimum Population in millions about 41.5 was reached at Year 2004
